description:
Timeless Malishev family home.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Julia Warren on 0432 182 271.
This seamless Malishev home is awaiting its lucky new owner.
Located just minutes to all of Highton and Waurn Ponds' finest amenities this home ticks all the boxes of convenience and livability.
Beyond the handsome façade you will be greeted by open light filled living spaces, with three living zones and a central family size kitchen. The main bedroom/master retreat is tucked away at the rear of the home with walk in robe, ensuite and doors out to the spacious gardens. Here you will also find the two further bedrooms, large light filled laundry and central family bathroom.
Stepping outside into the north sunshine you will land in the entertainer's dream, with endless undercover entertaining area and open spacious lawns & garden perfect for the kids, pets or anyone who enjoys a sense of space and privacy.
Key features:
-Malishev ex display home
-Spacious 720m2 approx. north facing block
-Cooling - ducted evaporated
-Heating 2x gas wall furnaces
-Solar panels, 5kw (2 years old)
-Electrolux induction cooking
-Smeg double oven
-Ceiling fans
-Drive through garage
-Walking distance to Waurn Ponds shopping & Porter Ave shops
-Bellaire Primary school zoned
-Within minutes to Christian College & Highton Primary School
-Minutes to Epworth Hospital & Deakin University
-Close to Augustine playground & reserve
-Flexible floor plan with multiple living zones

RESORT LIVING WITH STYLE
When the summer months hit, you want to be ready. So, when a resort style family home in a fabulous area with an inground pool enters the market, you'd best get in quick. Pack your floaties & let your cares drift away, because living here will be the best decision you've made all year!
The configuration of this property is going to be a sure-fire hit with all families. A spacious, open plan living, and dining area that opens to a fully decked north facing alfresco. Separate living area and a flexible study or 4th bedroom space that looks out onto the pool area.
An ensuite and walk-in robe feature in the master suite, whilst built-in robes can be found in the remaining 2 bedrooms. Plenty of filtered light into the family bathroom, which has a separate bath and shower, while also displaying the same striking tones found throughout the home.
For gatherings of friends and family, the large, covered area is perfect! This inviting space overlooks the inground pool and green hills. What a wonderful spot to enjoy our long summer nights ahead!
The surrounding yard space is big enough for the kids & four-legged family members to enjoy, but ever so easy for you to maintain.
The double garage features a separate storage room and even more storage can be found at the rear of the property.
Don't delay your inspection of this rare offering

Charming, Quiet and In Demand
Superbly updated with a sharp eye for detail, this charming weatherboard home is ready for you to move straight in. Spacious living room upon entry with hardwood floors flooded with natural light, this leads through to the kitchen overlooking the meals and second living space. Comprising 3 bedrooms (main with ceiling fan), central bathroom with separate toilet and large laundry. Double sliding doors open from the second living room onto the large deck, ideal for having family and friends around. This overlooks a meticulously landscaped large backyard with updated fencing and automatic water system for you to sit back and enjoy with privacy (653sqm) which also features a large garage.
Includes:
Ducted heating
2 x split system A/C
Dishwasher
Heat Pump Hot Water Unit
Re stumped
Double Blinds
Downlighting
There is simply nothing left to do. Positioned at the end of the street sits Clairvaux Primary School and within close proximity to Roslyn Primary and Belmont High Schools, the choice for schooling is terrific. McDonald Reserve is around the corner with ample open space and the house is situated only short drive or walk in between Highton Village, High Street Shops and Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre. Easy access to the freeway for the Melbourne Community or the Highway to the Surf Coast, also Deakin Uni and Epworth Hospital close by. This is a great opportunity that awaits the astute purchaser to secure this immaculate home.

Ideally designed for the busy family!!
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Ray Rounds on 0417 335 576.
Tucked away in a quiet secluded cul de sac, this 29 square home offers the perfect blend of spacious and low-maintenance living!
Convenient locations don't get much better than this, with the shops on Marshalltown Road and the Surf Coast Highway just moments from your front door. Nido Early School (Child Care) and Grovedale P.S. are a short stroll away for young families, while both Grovedale College and Iona College Geelong are wonderfully close by. Melbourne commuters will appreciate easy access to Marshall Train Station.
New carpet enhances the immaculate interiors, which exude a light and airy ambience throughout the home. Natural light sweeps through the spacious open plan living/dining/kitchen zone, which opens onto both the north-facing alfresco and rear sheltered courtyard creating a lovely indoor-outdoor flow for everyday enjoyment. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a built-in pantry and appliances. The lounge provides a generous setting that entices you to kick back and relax, while also opening onto the alfresco. You'll love that the lounge offers plenty of room to set up a study nook or kid's corner!
The Master Retreat is a dream come true for busy parents with direct access to the alfresco, plus ample room for a parents sitting area. The walk-in robe provides storage, while the en-suite features a large shower, dual vanity and toilet. Two additional bedrooms boast built-in robes, while the versatile 4th bedroom/study will delight with a built-in bookcase. The main bathroom, separate toilet and laundry completes the layout. Mod grass and low-maintenance gardens leave you free to enjoy the more important things in life.
Other Features of this property
Gas log fireplace and split-system air conditioner
- Dishwasher, electric cooktop, s/steel wall oven and rangehood
- Electric cooktop also features gas provision
- Security doors provide peace of mind
- Remote double lock-up garage with internal access
- Secure side vehicle access for a campervan, trailer, or boat
- Additional off-street parking is located at the front of the property
- Easy access to PT, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre & Armstrong Creek Town Centre
- Surf Coast Highway grants easy access to the Geelong CBD and Surf Coast beaches

If you are looking to buy a fantastic one owner family home in a superb location, then you don't need to look any further, It's all here at 15 Barry Court, Grovedale.

Single Level Allure in Stand out Location
For the first home buyer, downsizer or investor, this 3 bedroom home offers an exceptional opportunity to purchase a character home in a brilliant and convenient location. Situated in a quiet tree lined street the home offers easy comfortable and convenient living within walking distance to local primary schools, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Leisurelink Aquatic Centre and local sporting grounds and walking tracks. Upon entry to the home you are greeted with high raked ceilings creating a sense of space and style, the home offers a large open lounge room with adjoining dining area. The kitchen has had a beautiful makeover, offering new gas cooktop and oven, separate pantry and breakfast bar, adjoining the kitchen is a lovely light filled family room with raked ceilings and enjoys access to the large under cover rear deck which creates another living area. There are three spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, modern bright bathroom and laundry and split system heating and cooling in the living room and master bedroom and gas heating in the family room. Set on a landscaped and level allotment of approximately 650sqm with off street parking in the driveway. Within a short drive to train stations, Epworth Hospital, Deakin University,the Geelong Ring Road and more this stylish home is a great opportunity not to be missed.

FULL OF CHARACTER
This property is full of character and offers unlimited potential to create a coastal dream home.
Situated on a 550m² (approx) allotment, this classic holiday escape can be enjoyed as it is while you contemplate how to fulfil its promise. The views on offer from back of the property and hint at the potential panorama from a two storey home (STCA).
Highlights are open plan living, kitchen and meals area with a log fire. A second living space, 3 bedrooms with built in robes, Master with ensuite and a flexible space or 4th bedroom which can be used as a home office area or quiet zone.
The expansive garden boasts lush lawns and established trees and offers plenty of room to extend the footprint if required (STCA).
Ultimately though, the coveted location is the hero here. In just a few minutes you can have your toes in the sand and effortlessly enjoy world-class beaches

Jan Juc Court Coastal Haven to the North
Quietly tucked away in a secluded and sought after north facing court location, this striking home sits on the beach side of Sunset Strip and is ready for its new owners. A pleasing street appeal and design set over two levels nestled among mature landscaped gardens.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- Tightly held pocket of Jan Juc
- In the school zone for Bellbrae Primary
- Passive solar design
- Private North facing secure back yard surrounded by native gums
- 600m walk to clifftop walking tracks and the beach
- Super sized bedrooms
- Master bedroom on same floor as main living
- Second living area plus a study downstairs
- Timber windows
- Wood fire, split systems and wall mounted heating
- Raked ceilings upstairs
- Remote Double garage with rear roller door
- Minutes walk to the beach, 2km to Bells Beach
What The VENDOR LOVES:
We have really enjoyed the generous-sized deck and the feeling that we are perched in the tree tops. The extensive native gardens are so tranquil! The floor to ceiling windows overlook the deck and yard and flood the home with natural light.
There is so much storage and we love the open study area. - 'open' study area
Located in a friendly family environment within the Court the home has a bright coastal feel and is just around the corner to the beach & Jan Juc Shops.
Internal area
204.38m²

Unrivalled Family Coastal Living
Designed to take full advantage of the North West orientation, this substantial family home offers vast living spaces and is flooded with natural light. The downstairs kitchen and living area is the hub of the home and opens on to the outdoor undercover alfresco and yard making it a perfect space to come together with friends and family.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- Home office (optional 5th Bedroom)
- Theatre Room
- Second living room upstairs
- Impressive kitchen with stone benches, an abundance of storage and soft close drawers
- Butlers pantry plus walk in pantry
- Oversized island bench
- 900mm free standing oven and stove
- Powder room downstairs
- Spacious master with private balcony, separate his and hers walk in robes and ensuite with double vanity
- 2nd bedroom with walk in wardrobe, bedroom 3 and 4 with built in robes
- Timber look porcelain tiles
- Double glazing to some windows
- Gas ducted heating with three zones
- Outdoor hot and cold shower
- Oversized double garage with additional workshop
- Fully fenced West facing back yard
- Undercover alfresco, substantial decking with built in BBQ and bench seats
What the VENDOR LOVES:
We love the East outlook over the sand dunes from the master bedroom to watch the sunrise and the sunsets from the back yard. The home is full of natural light and has a comfortable coastal feel. There is so much storage throughout and the oversized double garage is a winner. We can walk down to the Sands Golf Course in 10 minutes or a couple of minutes further down to the beach.
Internal area
371.6m²

Brand New! Great First Home!
Private Inspections Welcome - By Appointment Only Be the first to enjoy this brand new contemporary family home. Designed with a modern lifestyle in mind and with a sun loving floor plan, it is ready to move in right away with nothing left to do but get on with the job of enjoying life.
You will love the generous open plan living, which features a sleek well-planned kitchen with quality stainless appliances, extra work and storage space, and a large central island breakfast bar. The north facing family area overlooks the private garden and there is easy flow to undercover outdoor entertaining from the dining area.
A second separate living zone is the perfect quiet space away from the main living hub, and would work equally well as media room. The master bedroom is a gorgeous retreat with its large walk in robe and deluxe en-suite featuring a frameless glass shower and double vanity. Three additional bedrooms are close by and share a family sized bathroom with separate bath and shower. A double lock up garage with room to store the beach toys completes the floor plan.
The on trend décor will accentuate your personal interior design style and the low maintenance exterior and gardens guarantee more downtime to enjoy coastal life.
With some of the newest facilities on the Surf Coast, Torquay North is a popular choice. Shops, schools, cafes and essential amenities are all a short walk away, and parks and beaches are nearby too. This property is definitely the one for anyone dreaming of a modern, stress free coastal life.
Note: Photo id with current address must be provided at all open for inspections due to Covid 19 restrictions.

STROLL TO THE BEACH!! ALL OFFERS CONSIDERED!!
This contemporary double storey low-maintenance residence delivers a first-class environment for those seeking the ultimate in townhouse living. Designed for lifestyle and location, you also receive access to the facilities of the Wyndham Resort, including indoor and outdoor swimming pools, tennis court and gymnasium.
Built by Mark Gleeson one of the Surf Coast's premier builders, this three bedroom home features an open plan kitchen, dining and living area of absolute quality and dimension, the living area features a gas log fire with built in cabinetry while the kitchen is complete with Caesar stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, 900mm cooktop and sliding glass doors that flows through to the north facing outdoor entertaining zone which boasts an automatic louvered roof. The master bedroom with en-suite, walk in robe and ceiling fan is located is the lower level along with the laundry, powder room and direct garage access. While the remaining two bedrooms of good proportion, built in robes and ceiling fans are located on the upper level alongside a family bathroom and second living offering a private balcony.
Other features include double glazed windows, polished concrete floors, outdoor shower, split system heating and cooling, ducted vacuum, surround sound system and plenty of storage. Here is your opportunity that makes for the perfect sea change, weekend getaway or investment property in a quiet location, only 500 metres to the beach and only a very short stroll to town centre, restaurants, cafes and all Torquay has to offer. Call today for more information.

Desirable living, location & ocean views!
For sale by Openn Negotiation (flexible conditions online auction). The Openn Negotiation is under way and the property can sell at any time. Contact Shaun immediately to become qualified and avoid disappointment.
https://www.openn.com.au/app/properties/view/btq2ctkkjfgg16670af0?negotiationId=btq2ctkkjfgg16670afg
Youll love:
This architecturally designed home in Jan Juc ticks all the boxes for sensational living with quality features & finishes, a cracking cul-de-sac location, and ocean views for days!
ALL the large picture windows throughout are stunning and complement the size & quality of this home that also consists of 4 bedrooms & multiple living areas to enjoy.
The spacious upstairs level is ideal for entertaining with its stylish kitchen, living & dining area that makes the most of the ocean views plus a large alfresco deck that captures the all-day sun.
Being situated at the end of this cul-de-sac with a great community feel AND having a fabulous park at your front doorstep, with public transport links & school bus stops at the other end of the street.
Plus:
Other quality features throughout include solid timber flooring, split system heating & cooling on both levels, additional ceiling fans and loads more.
Theres 2 spacious bedrooms upstairs that share a bathroom and 2 bedrooms downstairs that do the same thing; plus the master bedroom includes a large walk-in robe.
Downstairs also features a large void entry, 2nd living area with a sheltered outdoor patio, a double remote garage with direct access, 2 more off street parking spaces plus excellent storage throughout.
Lastly, you will love this homes secluded & private feel, plus all the native & low maintenance plantings include too so book your private inspection today!

Flexible family living in an ideal location
Youll love:
This large modern home has plenty of space for the whole family to spread out, with 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 huge living zones & a fantastic outdoor area that wraps around at the back to enjoy.
High ceilings & a wide entrance hallway set the tone for the generous living on the ground floor.
The quality kitchen includes a 900mm oven & cooktop, 40mm stone benchtops, plus a walk-in pantry and large island bench that overlooks the main living & outdoor entertaining area.
Upstairs features a huge 2nd living area which takes in an impressive sea view that cant be built out plus it has a great home/office space & a balcony too!
Plus:
All four bedrooms are located on the ground floor, including the large master suite with ensuite, plantation shutters and WIRs.
Theres an abundance of storage options & ducted heating throughout, with additional split system heating & cooling servicing both living areas too.
Other property features include attractive & low maintenance landscaping, two large rainwater tanks, a handy outdoor shower, plus a double remote garage with even more room for bulky storage.
Located in the family-friendly Quay Estate, with the Pirate Playground just four doors down and the Dunes Village 200m in the opposite direction this wonderful home ticks all the right boxes & more.

Superb family lifestyle in desired locale.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Cam Foster on 0406 597 050.
Situated in a quiet cul de sac amongst the Highton Hills, this spacious family home boasts sensational outdoor entertaining complete with a solar-heated pool. Enjoy seamless access to Queens Park Golf Course, the Barwon River, Buckley Falls, public transport and quality education facilities for all ages.
Consisting of four generous bedrooms, two separate living areas and a study, not to mention the expansive open plan kitchen, living and dining area which seamlessly flows out onto the north facing entertaining area, complemented immensely with the solar heated pool. With summer on the horizon, indoor/outdoor living and hosting friends and family will be an absolute treat.
This quality family property truly provides something for each member of your family. The master suit is one to dream about in size. Including its own ensuite with double vanity, expansive walk in robe and split system, this bedroom needs to be inspected to grasp the grandeur. The remaining bedrooms are complete with their own built in robes and are all serviced by the central bathroom and separate toilet.
Key features include evaporative cooling, gas log fireplace, ducted heating, ducted vacuum, walk in pantry, caravan/boat parking space and a double car garage with internal access. This property is sure to excite those keen to secure their new family home within close proximity of Queens Park.

Large, Packed with features and what a view!
Sitting on 620m2 this impressive 2 Storey 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with study, 3 living zones and DLUG has everything the large or growing family would need and more. Approximately 8.5 years old it sits high on the hill in Leopold and enjoys panoramic views looking west from Corio Bay to Torquay. Built by Metricon it has been designed with space and comfort in mind. The layout has a porcelain tile floor entrance foyer. To the left is the first living space. To the right is the access to the 2 car garage which is plumbed. Moving further into the home is the powder room and laundry. Beyond this is the 2nd living space on the right and further on the open plan living, dining and kitchen. The kitchen really is unusually well equipped with the 900ml cooktop in the island bench which is great when entertaining and cooking. This is complimented by 2 ovens - an 80ltr pyrolytic and a dual purpose steam oven. This is in addition to a convection microwave. A large butler's pantry with sink and plenty of cupboard and bench space complete this serious cook's kitchen. Upstairs is another living space and balcony with amazing views and potentially a study nook. All the bedrooms are upstairs with the master at the front of the home also with its own balcony. The ensuite features an oversized shower recess, twin vanities with stone benches and a separate toilet. Twin double door wardrobes feature hanging and drawer space. The remaining bedrooms all have built in robes and are serviced by a central bathroom with spa. Climate control throughout the home is via split system aircon and ceiling fans. Outside has a low maintenance garden at the front, a pebble mix pathway at the side and gazebo and entertainment deck at the rear with terraced lawn space. This really is an amazing package loaded with features and benefits. With the stakes in Leopold rising and rising this one is worth a closer look!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Large on Living and Light The Joys of a Single Storey Home
Enjoy the benefits of single storey living in this coastal home with its flowing floor plan and vast open plan living area. Featuring raked ceilings with clerestory windows for optimal natural light, and stack sliding doors on the North and West allowing you to seamlessly extend your living space to the outdoors.
Within walking distance to the Quay Oval Reserve and within close proximity to The Dunes Shopping Village and schools.
What YOU'LL LOVE
- Two living areas inside and two outdoor alfresco areas
- Modern functional kitchen featuring 40mm stone waterfall island bench
- Impressive walk in butlers pantry
- Aluminum stack sliding doors in main living
- Large master with ensuite with double vanity
- Gas central heating, evaporative cooling and gas log fireplace
- Ceiling fans in bedrooms
- Timber plantation shutters to front of house
- Electric blinds on clerestory windows
- Private yard surrounded by well established garden by Eco Beach Landscaping
- Water sprinkling system
- Security system
- Side gate access
- 700m walk to the Sands Clubhouse and 1km to the beach
What the VENDOR LOVES:
"When we decided to make the move to Torquay we wanted an open plan with light filled rooms which gave us an inside outside feel. Where we built is in a very friendly neighborhood and in a quiet street, it has the added advantage of being only 1 km to the beach and quite often we hear the surf crashing on to the shore. We also enjoy the Torquay lifestyle."
Internal area
278.7m²
